website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for a protective desk blotter made from renewable plant resources will be thrilled with this low-cost option.
pros: Has a non-slip surface to reduce writing fatigue and low chemical emissions for those who may have health issues
Protects the desk surface without sticking to it, and is thin enough to work on without it being intrusive
cons: Does not provide elbow or wrist cushioning thicker pads have
may slide a bit on smooth desks

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to cut to fit the curves
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 different sizes of this mat for my solid wood desk. It was easy to cut to fit the curves. One mat is under my keyboard, the other is on the main working part of my desk. There is absolutely no slippage at all. They were shipped flat and there are no ripples at all. I've only been using them for a few days, but they don't seem to mark easily. I would definitely recommend these mats.
customer_reviews.author: shall

customer_reviews.title: It does look nice, but be warned not to use it on ...
customer_reviews.text: This product totally destroyed the finish on my desk. So while I got it to preserve wooden desk from scratches whatever material is made from ate the finish off of the wood, so I will have to have my desk redone or leave this mat in place for ever. It does look nice, but be warned not to use it on a wooden desk.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Adding a cork backing layer
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the 36" x 20" ES Robbins pad, I decided that I wanted to add a backing to give it a thicker, more tactile feel, and to protect the surface of my old wood desk. I used spray-on contact cement () to attach a cork sheet () to the back of the ES Robbins pad, and I am very happy with the result. The combined thickness is about 1⁄8" (3.2 mm).
customer_reviews.author: Timo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for a raggedy desk calendar
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a desk calendar that got all messed up from constant movement of the keyboard, spilling drinks on it, and writing on it for so long. This desk pad pretty much met all my expectations plus is described as made in America. Has a low profile when it lays against the desk, so I don't hit it, plus I am now able to sit my drinks anywhere I want. Have no issues writing on it as it keeps my desk safe from writing damage. Would definately recommend you pick this up if you are in need of some desk protection for underneath your keyboard or need it for a writing desk.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: It covers my gross dirty desk.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It covers my gross, dirty desk. My wood desk has a sticky, dirty surface that I am not able to get clean, even after scrubbing. The previous owner must have spilled food and beverages on this desk. Really gross. So I looked online and found this desk pad. It is the perfect size. It feels like soft rubber, not hard plastic. One side is smooth, the other side has a texture. It's very pliable and lays flat on my desk. It does show fingerprints and dust, but I don't care. Now my wrists don't stick to the desk when I'm typing..
customer_reviews.author: AlphaPepper

customer_reviews.title: Desk Protection
customer_reviews.text: I received a new desk at the office a couple years ago. I'd noticed wear spots on others where the keyboard and mouse sit so I wanted something that would protect the beautiful smooth finish on the desk. This looks professional, stays in place and is large enough to provide a solid work surface. Most of the time, I forget its there. It is black so it shows lint, etc, but its also very easy to keep clean with a quick wipe of the hand or cloth. A coworker of mine also bought one on my recommendation. Both of us are still using them a couple years later.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lemmons

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not under any circumstances buy this desk pad if you have a wood desk. This desk pad RUINED my desk. It totally dissolved the finish off my desk and left a sticky substance behind!! I spent over $800 for my computer desks and both need refinishing from these desk pads!!! Don't believe what you read when it says that it won't mar your desk top. What I was told was that there are petroleum products in these desk pads when they are made and will totally take away any finish from a wood desk.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Easily wipes clean of dust and spills
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was sooner than promised. The pad arrived packaged in a flat box packaging (double boxed) rather than in a tube so there were no curling issues when applied on the desk and it immediately laid flat to the surface. The pad appears to be a durable rubber-like product which should serve its intended purpose of protecting the desk top for quite a while. Easily wipes clean of dust and spills. If you're looking for a quality yet simple desk-top protector I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on a wood desk.
customer_reviews.text: The desk mat left an oily wet film under the mat and on my custom made wooden desk. After a thorough cleaning and polishing, I noticed that there were spots left on the desk top where the mat was placed, which were most likely caused by this oily residue. Do not purchase this desk mat for a real wood desk.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good desk pad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good desk pad for the price. Other plastic-like desk pads I have purchased in the past tend to curl upward around the corner edges over time. This pad feels pliant enough to prevent edge curl but this can only be determined over time (I've only owned for less than a month). It also has good feel when writing on it and my optical mouse moves smoothly without the need for a mouse pad. The only negative is that the bottom is smooth so the pad can slide around on a smooth desk surface. This pad would be greatly improved if it had a slight tackiness to the underside, but overall I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Willy T

customer_reviews.title: Great surface for writing and to protect your desk or ...
customer_reviews.text: Great surface for writing and to protect your desk or work area from scratches, and damage. I repair electronics, watches, and eyeglasses on the same desk I study and surf the web on and this seems hard enough for all of it. Cleans up nice with Windex after I do a messy job, slides around though so I looped some clear tape on eight spots and stuck it to the desk to prevent it from moving since it had no sticky side. I'm happy can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Borges

customer_reviews.title: My grandson had one like this only a lot bigger
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had one like this only a lot bigger,I was thrilled to be able to get this in the prefect size that I needed. I have a sewing machine cabinet that is doing double duty as a desk and this covers us the sections on the desk that lift for the sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Bolduc

customer_reviews.title: No more desk scratches!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I admit that I bought this desk pad to cover up the scratches on my desktop. Mission accomplished! Very durable , and it looks great . The surface has a slight texture to it, so my computer mouse pad is now history. I have cleaned the surface with both Windex and furniture polish. Either product cleans well depending on what type of finish you want to be the end result . Very pleased. Very durable. Oh, and no more visible desk scratches. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: BrookhavenGuy

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This really is a nice desk pad, I'm very happy with it. The pad stays flat and doesn't curl up around the edges. Being used on a black desk, it blends perfectly and really protects the surface. The only feature that bothers me at all is the fact that a sheet of paper might sit so flat on the pad I can't grasp it with my fingers, so sometimes I need to grab something to push the paper up off the pad, but it's a minor issue. The pad is really easy to clean, and has held up under a lot of use. Perfect for writing on, it has just the right cushion!
customer_reviews.author: P. Tower

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose for me!
customer_reviews.text: With Amazon Prime y product came within 2 days as promised. I purchased this because my wooden desk is starting to peel and I can't afford to buy a new one at the moment so I thought that maybe putting this would help with clean up and look nice again. And I was right! I have a 40x 20 inch desk and this was the biggest size I cold find that could fit those constraints and it looks great! Just what I was looking for its thin and blends well with my black desk.
customer_reviews.author: CrisBee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Large-Sized Mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk mat. I work from home and have a large desk with two computer monitors, and this fits both of them perfectly. It has a smooth side and a more textured side (which I have facing up). The mat does not slide, and is firm enough to support being written on without marking up the desk. And it will protect my desk when I inevitably spill my coffee, so that’s a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Anne G.

customer_reviews.title: Simply works
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use it to protect my desk while I draw. I'm a professional illustrator and having something that provides a nice smooth surface is important. I recently purchased a new desk and figured this would be a good idea to protect the glass top. I have been surprised and pleased with how it has worked. No curling of the sides and corners. It immediately fit on the desk securely and will definitely look towards purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J Wright

customer_reviews.title: ... arrived in a very sketchy thin package it works great. I have a black wooden desk so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this item arrived in a very sketchy thin package it works great. I have a black wooden desk so I wanted something just over the top of it to keep it safe. It is nice and never slips from my everyday task and I work 8+ hours on my desk with a lot of items shifting. I like that it is easy to clean with a damp cloth and looks very expensive , but definitely doesn't break the bank. Its not the most comfortable desk pad but it is very thin and does the job well. I would recommend this to my mom, my brother, and my uncle!
customer_reviews.author: William Sung

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mat for a 20" x 46" desk. The 20" dimension fits the desk perfectly, with no overhang. It was shipped flat in a box, protected with paper and cardboard within the shipping box. It arrived perfectly smooth. (My 8 year old sitting next to me right now wants me to add that she liked the paper in which it was wrapped... "I could draw pictures on the [large sheets of] paper.")
customer_reviews.author: Regina R

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the concerns about the potential effects of PVC vapors, etc. But I don't plan to eat this desk mat. Plus, I worked in a PVC factory to help pay for college years ago. And I'm still here & healthy. This mat stays in place on my wooden desk, it isn't shiny on the top (per the instructions, the shiny side goes down) and I can sign checks and do other writing on it with ease. I'm very happy with this mat. And it was shipped to me FLAT.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Slight warps confused my optical mouse
customer_reviews.text: At first this pad was exactly what I needed for my desktop/mouse situation. But less than six months in, it has slightly warped to a point where my optical mouse goes crazy trying to figure out how to bounce its LED back from the surface. It's not much, but enough to confuse the mouse and frustrate me when I'm working. I still keep it on the desktop (the mouse is now on a unused smooth floor tile I had lying around) because it covers up the scratches and other permanent marks that my wooden desktop has collected over time.
customer_reviews.author: DMFriend

customer_reviews.title: It is a good desk pad
customer_reviews.text: It is a good desk pad, thick sort of piece of rubber like plastic, holds it's place and protects the desk well. I like that I can drag it out of the edge slightly to protect the rounded figurative front edge of this old mahogany desk top. I don't think it looks as nice as a leather one, but it is not as expensive and it does offer great protection for my desk.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Crane

customer_reviews.title: It ruined my $1,500 Hekman desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk pad took off the varnish and paint from my $1,500 Hekman desk that it was meant to protect. Also, it left a sticky residue that I can't get off the desk surface. I'm very displeased about this and don't reccomend this product to anyone. I believe this company should pay for the damage that their product did.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this pad for a wood desk
customer_reviews.text: If you have a wood desk, do not buy this product. I placed the pad on my wood desk and removed it one year later. The pad somehow bonded to the desktop, creating countless bubbly blotches on the wood. No cleaning product would remove them. The desktop needed to be sanded and restrained. Other customers have experienced this same issue and written Amazon reviews about it. The pad itself worked great. I can see it being just fine on a glass desktop. I contacted the manufacturer, who was prompt and responsive in solving the costly issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K.

customer_reviews.title: Totally ruined our Ethan Allen Desks. Hope the company will do something about this.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these desk pads to protect our very expensive solid cherry Ethan Allen desks. I just realized that the entire area which was supposed to be 'protected' by the pad was physically destroyed. I reached out directly to the company to see what can be done since there are several complaints about this now.
customer_reviews.author: BML

customer_reviews.title: Decent, until you look underneath.
customer_reviews.text: Was the size I wanted and looks great but if I ever decide to not use it or move it, I'll be exposing a residue that countless cleaners have not been able to move. I emailed the company for recommendations on what to use to remove the residue and they chose to ignore my message. So unless I keep this cover for life, I'm left with a ruined desk in the area where this pad sits.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Cuts a Bit On The Edge of the Desk, Looks Nice Though
customer_reviews.text: The edge is a bit sharp and cuts against my forearm if I have it on the edge of the desk. Thats the only problem, doesn't quite mold down. Otherwise, seems OK and certainly looks nice. I just have to be careful how I place my arms at my desk. May be nicer if the edges were beveld/rounded like the desk so it's smooth but this is not. I have it right at the edge of the desk and it chafes my forearms every time. Gotta work with my arms up now?...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a mouse pad.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I expected. More of a plastic feel than a mouse pad feel but works good. Very large and takes up a good space on my desk. I'm happy that I did purchase this though because it does hold my things in place better than the wood and you can put paper on it and write. I draw with a thin pen tip on paper on top of this daily now. Works well to hold the paper in place just enough.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old bomber desk with a pretty worn top, and this mat really made the desk look and function so much nicer. No curl and no noticeable odor (unless I put my nose right up to it). I wish I had purchased this years ago, I love my desk again!
customer_reviews.author: L. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Nice matt, wrinklier after 3-4 months
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt move when I scoot around my keyboard or wacom tablet, but where I rest my arms gets wrinkled after just a few months. Irritating. For the love of Jesus.
customer_reviews.author: Tazman5150

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Glass topped desk, in black, constantly in danger of scratches. This covers the entire work space, is attractive, is very easy to clean with a bit of Windex and a rag. Just what I needed. Only caution: don't put something very hot on the surface without some sort of pad, or several sheets of paper. Just once I had a cup of coffee I'd heated -- overheated, boiled to within an inch of its life -- in a microwave, and it resulted in a mild mark. My bad, and no discredit to the pad.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR WOOD FINISH DESKS
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS FOR A FINISHED WOOD DESK. These are great desk blotters but they will ruin the finish on your wood desk as they did to mine and everyone else.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Size for Larger Surfaces
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my side of our large, custom desk. The widest desk blotter I could find, it fits perfectly and protects the surface. Made of decently thick plastic, it doesn't seem to slide around and stays put. I purchased this particular blotter mainly due to the reviews here on Amazon, I'm happy with it so far and liked that even though it was a huge box, it came shipped flat and not rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: Dewpoint Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment for the Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Use it on top of the coffee table which invariable becomes the dining room, computer desk and drink station for what ever reason! Pretty solid build and large enough to cover a good part of the coffee table, Furniture is dark so blends right in. If the queen ever comes over I can remove it I guess. Also have one on the desk in the study.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: be ware of the wrinkles (old and new)
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine. But there's one problem. It came with a deep crease in the corner, which I figured comes from the pressing in the thin package during shipment. No biggie, let's try flipping it backwards with hands ... oh ok, that's very stubborn That's fine, let's try iron it (no water steam; put paper in between for protection) ...after 20 mins, no luck. No problem, let's try put it on a heavy weight on it overnight. ...damn, now I got a new round shaped wrinkle?! had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but cut easily. They are a little "sticky" to move your ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Bought 2 for both sides of an L shaped desk. Just had to trim a little with scissors to fit the way I wanted, but cut easily. They are a little "sticky" to move your computer mouse around on, but I think if one were to use some type of cleaner or something on them that could be cured.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: What I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I needed. It does not have any backing to stop from slipping but I haven't had any problems with it moving. So it worked out well and I am happy with the purchase. It was packaged well and there were no defects.
customer_reviews.author: Caspian

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cover for your desk, just don't expect the feel of leather
customer_reviews.text: Smells like new binders (that normal vinyl smell despite being a plant based plastic) and is lingering now a few hours later. Doesn't have the feel of leather, but it works ok. The giant size is great, I just was hoping for a better 'look and feel'.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a desk mat that had a thin foam backing. The old mat had been in place for several years and the foam backing adhered to the desk top. After spending a lot of time and elbow grease removing the residue I didn't want to put something with foam back on the desk. This has a smooth back and doesn't slide around. It seems like a good product that will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sells

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a teacher!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. The Mr can set it up at one end of the dining room table and grade those papers all day. I got the BIG one, and I'm glad. It rolls up neatly, and the edges flatten out pretty quickly after it's unrolled.
customer_reviews.author: ShopsInPajamas

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk mat at an affordable price. Not the most visually pleasing but certainly gets the job done. I've been using it for a few months and it is showing no signs of falling apart
customer_reviews.author: RM wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: ES Robbins vs. Lorell
customer_reviews.text: First, I purchased the Lorell Desk Pad, 20 x 36 Inches, Clear. It worked ok, but the ES Robbins seems to have just a little more "give" and that's what was needed. It's slightly easier to write on and the mouse seems to work better on it too. Not sure if that's because this is black and the Lorell is clear, but it does affect the mouse.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Nice pad and great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get 2 of these and cut them to fit my entire desk top (the large size offered was too big), but the price was very good and I like the pads a lot. Wish I didn't have that seem in the middle, but I sit the laptop there, so covers it, for the most part. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: This pad provides an excellent writing surface
customer_reviews.text: This pad provides an excellent writing surface, and saves me the trouble of using coasters. It has a shiny side and a matte one; as other reviewers have noted, I would recommend placing the shiny side down for the best writing surface and the least glare. I have only had it for a week and so cannot speak to longevity, but it seems to be well made, and was very well packaged, flat in the box to avoid bending.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mat
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the mat, as well as the surface, color, and thickness. The reason I didn't give five stars is that the edges are not beveled and are quite sharp. I ran a sharp knife along the top front edge to make the mat comfortable for my forearms--an easy fix. Also the packaging was inadequate and broken, so the mat arrived bent in the middle. However, it is vinyl, so after sitting on top of my desk for a day, the kink completely disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dasek

customer_reviews.title: Slide Around
customer_reviews.text: This desk pad slid around too much on my wood top desk. My husband took it over and his laptop sits on top of it and holds it in place. I wanted something that could be a writing surface and it just wasn't effective as it kept moving around. Be aware of that and how you want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Breen

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME AS ORDERED BEFORE
customer_reviews.text: I basically reordered the same item that I bought a few months back. I received today and the ones bought previously are a hard plastic and the one I received today is more like a rubbery consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for several months as of the writing of this review. I use this product to create an extra workspace on my office credenza. Does the job I need it to do. Very easy to clean and protects the wood under it. Did not have a weird smell like some other reviewers mentioned. Also very durable and stays flat on the desk (in fact still looks as new as when I received it).
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my desk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect my brand new wooden desk. Initially I thought it was fantastic - did a great job of protecting the desk or so i thought. One day I went to remove it from the desk and found it stuck and that it caused the finish to bubble up and become ruined! The desk wasn't even a year old. The damage is irreparable - unless someone completely strips it down and refinishes it. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: k dub

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Big, easy to write on, and able to use it as a mousepad is what I was looking for. The surface is really good for writing on and decent as a mousepad (my mouse occasionally sticks to it). I love that it shipped flat so that it lays perfectly on my desk with no curling. I took one star off because it was advertised as having a matte finish however the actual product has a glossy finish. Overall it is a good product but would be better if it was, in fact, a matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Gish&Chips

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what we needed! I'm so happy I thought to look on Amazon because I found just what I wanted. It's excellent quality, noticeably cheaper than the ones they sell at our office supply store and a better quality thickness too. I absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: California Avocado Lover

customer_reviews.title: Durable, smooth, and just the right thickness
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of this desk pad. For the price, it really can't be beat. Used it to cover up an area of my son's desk which was a bit "war-torn" with marks, divots and chips. It served that purpose perfectly, without adding much thickness or softness. Durable, smooth, and all-in-all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Toga Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice, large pad.
customer_reviews.text: A nice large pad. But it arrived with a small dent in the middle of the pad. Not bad enough that i will return it, but it would have been nice if it was inspected and/or packaged more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great for desk and environment!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk pad! this has held up well to heavy use and saved my wood desk from any damage. It looks very sharp on a cherry wood surface. It is also good to know that it is made with renewable materials.
customer_reviews.author: sjreview

customer_reviews.title: This is a great basic desk pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic desk pad. It smells a little bit when you first open it, but that goes away with on the first day. It provides a nice backer to write on but doesn't keep indents from writing.
customer_reviews.author: B Extra

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful and nice addition to a desk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have a black glass corner desk in a very dusty apartment. The glass ended up looking crappy after a week of purchasing it, so I ended up just using a ton of big mousepads to cover it up. I ended up finding this product, and everything feels so much better now. I can finally write on my desk again (writing on a mousepad or on glass both feel weird) which is very nice. The product slides a little bit, but once you get weight on it, it stays down well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bahr

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this desk pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good desk mat for the price. It's thick enough and seems sturdy. I use it on a glass-top table and although it has no foam underneath, only a slick surface, I have no problem with it sliding around. Read the dimensions- it's small but was all I need.
customer_reviews.author: AH in Pgh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised and works great. Does not have great chemical resistance and some ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and works great. Does not have great chemical resistance and some products with solvents in them will attack it.
customer_reviews.author: jayhawker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great pad for keeping desk clean. Note: it is a hard material so don't expect it to provide much cushion for elbows or wrists. It also tracks really well with mice and keeps desk looking clean. Tip: use 3M double sided tape to keep corners from rolling/folding upwards.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio P.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I like it but took one star off because it tends to slide around a bit and I took another star off because the edge of the pad is a tad sharp. I wish it had a tapered edge. All in all though I'm fairly happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: Careful if Using on a Wood Desk
customer_reviews.text: Ruined the finish on my expensive wood desk. Finish on desk bubbled up from an interaction between the pad & the finish. Do not buy if you have a real wood desk. A couple of other recent commenters say the same thing. It's a refinish job on my desk now because of this stupid pad. They don't seem to mention that in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Cagee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Sized perfectly Item is "thin" and replaced a ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality Sized perfectly Item is "thin" and replaced a much thicker pad so wasn't sure how well it would be received by the lady of the house - she likes it better than the old one Noticeable "new" odor when removed from packaging - no big deal - put in garage for day or two before install if you don't like the smell
customer_reviews.author: MR JOEL D SCHRIOCK

customer_reviews.title: This has worked great. At first it is a little warped from ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great. At first it is a little warped from the packing but let it settle and it will flatten out.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for its purpose. Since the top of my desk is a little warped after a flood, this pad smoothed out the surface very well and is a snap to write on with no problems. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on desk for computer, light, mouse, coffee mug and a few desk accessories. I've had no problems using my mouse on it, no scratches, and easy to wipe clean. As stateed in other reviews, it is shipped flat and ready to use!
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It lays flat on my desk and is a comfortable writing surface. The mouse works well on it. It's a great price for this 38x24 size.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bogart

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. The only thing I was surprised by was how large it actually was but it worked out well. I bought two of these to cover up my glass desk and could not be happier. The price cannot be beat anywhere.
